title: Retired Skins
body: Can someone pls explain how these work? I really want Angler Jax, Annie in wonderland, Stinger Akali, Vandle Vald , and so on. But these skins are retired, so what does that mean ? Will I never be able to buy them, or will they show up in random occasions in the shop ?

replies.body:
They are not "retired skins"
They are "legacy skins", which means they will come back to the shop whenever Riot decides to open the legacy vault again

Btw, retired skins are those that will never come back again. Rusty Blitzcrank is an example

Judgment Kayle was a free gift, given to those who played a certain number of games at the end of Season 1.
The skin is a reference to the comic book character Judge Dredd, most notably the shoulder plates.

Hiya! 

Here's a [quick guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752944-Guide-to-Legacy-and-Limited-Skins) to the different kinds of skins, and what they mean! 

In your case, Angler Jax is a Legacy skin, which means it may come back when we open the Legacy vault, which happens periodically! Legacy Skins above 520RP are available through Mystery Gifting.

Retired = never returning, ever.
Legacy = rarely unlocked
Limited edition = one chance on them, will likely never come back to store

On the other hand you can get legacy skins through mystery skins.
They will return occasionally for events and such
